sqlMap.select: select * ,(SELECT count(1) FROM sys_timetask_log x WHERE x.timetaskid = t.id) AS runcount ,(SELECT logtime FROM sys_timetask_log x WHERE x.timetaskid = t.id ORDER BY logtime DESC LIMIT 1) AS lastruntime ,(SELECT logstatus FROM sys_timetask_log x WHERE x.timetaskid = t.id ORDER BY logtime DESC LIMIT 1) AS lastrunstatus ,(SELECT loginfo FROM sys_timetask_log x WHERE x.timetaskid = t.id ORDER BY logtime DESC LIMIT 1) AS lastrunlogs FROM sys_timetask t WHERE $qry$ AND isdelete = false ORDER BY groupname DESC , jobname DESC LIMIT $limit$ OFFSET $start$
select count(*) AS counts FROM sys_timetask t WHERE $qry$ AND isdelete = false
select * FROM _sys_timetask_log t WHERE $qry$ $filter$ ORDER BY logtime DESC LIMIT $limit$ OFFSET $start$
select count(*) AS counts FROM _sys_timetask_log t WHERE $qry$ $filter$
